name: rlmfn

stmt.origin: fnmpti(hs0, crglmod, universe, cfv(cfv(csra, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))))

body.origin:
|- wfn(crglmod, universe)
-| wcel(cfv(cfv(csra, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0))), universe)
-| wceq(crglmod, cmpt(hs0, universe, cfv(cfv(csra, cv(hs0)), cfv(cbs, cv(hs0)))))
-| diffsc(hs0, universe)

⊢ ringLMod[Fn]𝕌

⊣ ringLMod =(hs0 ∈ 𝕌 ↦((subringAlg ` hs0)`(Base ` hs0)))
⊣ d(hs0, 𝕌)
